jdbcConnectionString.title: Connection String
jdbcConnectionString.description: Specify the JDBC connection string. (Supports EL)

jdbcConnectionUsername.title: Username
jdbcConnectionUsername.description: Specify the JDBC connection username. (Supports EL)

jdbcConnectionPassword.title: Password
jdbcConnectionPassword.description: Specify the JDBC connection password. (Supports EL)

jdbcQuery.title: Query
jdbcQuery.description: Specify the JDBC query string. (Supports EL)
jdbcQuery.default: SELECT some_column FROM some_table WHERE some_column='some_text'

variables.title: Context variables
variables.description: Use 'Context Variables' to extract field values from your SQL response

value.title: Value
value.description: Tip: use array indices (eg: '#jdbcResponse.content[0]') to access the first record from your SQL response

jdbcHeaders.title: Use X-JDBC header(s)
jdbcHeaders.description: If enabled, Gravitee will populate the X-JDBC header with the status/outcome of your SQL statement

jdbcDebugHeaders.title: Debug to Headers
jdbcDebugHeaders.description: If enabled, Gravitee will populate the X-JDBC-DEBUG-RESPONSE header with the full SQL response (or SQL Exception)
